event.title: Android without Google Play Services and Migrating API services
event.description:
Hi, We're back to the regular talk nights this month and we have a real treat lined up! We've themed the evening around building Android apps that aren't dependent/restricted by Google Play and the lessons learn from a large backend API service migration at Just Eat. Thanks to the Royal Bank of Scotland for hosting us and providing food and refreshments at the venue. Please note: the map on meetup.com is not accurate please use this https://goo.gl/maps/iQ5sT35he7U2

As usual please only RSVP if you are certain you can make it and update accordingly. Thanks

Talk 1: David Branton - Work Hard, Play Hard
Building Android apps without the dependency of Google Play services

Talk2: Dave Jones - The Great Migration
Lessons learn from backend API service migration at Just Eat

Talk 3: Elliot Long - Ayatollah not to do that
A study in Android app delivery despite government censorship

Usual timetable.

• 18:30 doors open / food and drinks provided / networking

• 19:00 Intros

• 19:10 Talks

• 19:[masked]min comfort break

• 19:55 Talks

• 20:50 finish up and head to the pub for a round on us and further chances to network.
